original_text: They had caught the women and the other people who were in the town, both young people and old people. They did not kill any of them, but they took them away as prisoners.
korean_text: 거기에 있는 젊거나 늙은 여인들은 한 사람도 죽이지 아니하고 다 사로잡아 끌고 자기 길을 갔더라

sentences.original_text: and the other people who were in the town
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성에 있던 다른 사람들도 붙잡았습니다

sentences.original_text: both young people and old people
They did not kill any of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들 중 누구도 죽이지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: but they took them away as prisoners
